basics.name: Atharva Rahane
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a Master's in Mechanical Engineering at the Michigan Technological University. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2020.

education.institution: Savitribai Phule Pune University, Maharashtra, India

highlights: Performed thermal analysis on electronic components, prepared simulation cases and studied the heat transmitted by the electronic components to the circuit board
Performed thermal analysis on welded joints

volunteer.summary: Cooling of High power Density Electronics
highlights: Contributed in a team to develop a cooling system for electronics, using micro-structured mesh and piezo electric transducers
Performed simulations to analyze results in conjunction with the experimental data

volunteer.summary: Thermal Management of Electric Vehicle Battery

Designed a passive Cooling Cell using Phase Change Material(PCM) to maintain the battery cell temperature in the range of optimum operating conditions

volunteer.position: Senior Design Team CFD Simulation Mentor
highlights: Mentored senior year design team for design and CFD simulation
